alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ocean County through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jackson, or 8 miles northwest of Toms River, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Jackson, Beachwood, Seaside Heights, Leisure Village, Brick Township, Dover Beaches North, Pleasant Plains, Cedar Glen West, Jacksons Mills, Leisure Village East, Dover Beaches South, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park, Vista Center, South Toms River, Island Heights, Leisure Knoll and Gilford Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 23 and 24. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 82 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
